channel.title: NUML Events on NUML
channel.description: Recent content in NUML Events on NUML

item.title: Example Post
item.description: You can use blog posts for announcing product updates and features.

item.title: Example Guide
item.description: Guides lead a user through a specific task they want to accomplish, often with a sequence of steps. Writing a good guide requires thinking about what your users are trying to do.

item.title: Example Reference
item.description: Reference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.

item.title: NUML Debate Society 2024 - Event Concluded
item.description: The NUML Debate Society 2024 inter-departmental bilingual declamation competition has successfully concluded. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all organizers, participants, and attendees for making this event memorable. Thank you for showcasing your public speaking talent and making this event a success!

item.title: NUML Hackathon 2024
item.description:
NUML Hackathon 2024 - Event Recap

We are thrilled to announce the successful conclusion of the NUML Hackathon 2024! Over the past three days, participants demonstrated incredible talent, creativity, and determination across all competitions, including Coding, Web Development, Graphic Designing, and the Math Trivia challenge. The energy and enthusiasm were truly inspiring, making this year’s HackForge an unforgettable experience.

item.title: NUML Hackathon 2024 - Results
